name: I'm Gonna Hire A Wino Multiple Choice Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which artist recorded "I'm Gonna Hire a Wino to Decorate Our Home"?
questions.explanation:
David Frizzell.

	David Frizzell is Lefty Frizzell's younger brother.

questions.text: After they tear out all the carpet, what are they going to put on the floor?
questions.explanation:
Sawdust.

	"I'm Gonna Hire a Wino to Decorate Our Home" hit number 1 on the Billboard Country Chart in 1982.

questions.text: What do they have to take out to put the bar in?
questions.explanation:
Dining Room Table.

	David Frizzell won two CMA Awards, both for Vocal Duo of the Year with Shelly West.

questions.text: Fill in the Blank:  The ______ Bear says it's closing time.
questions.explanation:
Hamm's.

	This song originally was found on the album "Family's Fine, But This One's Mine". The album is no longer in print, but this song can be found on his Greatest Hits album.

questions.text: What types of food will be served?
questions.explanation:
Hard-boiled eggs and pretzels.

	At age 12, David hitchhiked form Arkansas to California to join his brother Lefty on tour.

questions.text: What will be kept on hand so they can prove they are men?
questions.explanation:
Soft aluminum cans.

	His biggest hit was the duet with Shelly West entitled "You're The Reason God Made Oklahoma".

questions.text: According to the lyrics in "I'm Gonna Hire A Wino", where will the neon sign point to?
questions.explanation:
The bathroom.

	His other solo hits included "I Just Can't Help Believing", "Lost My Baby Blues" and "A Million Light Beers Ago".

questions.text: Fill in the blank:  Instead of family quarrels, we'll have a barroom _____?
questions.explanation:
brawl.

	Other songs by Frizzell and West included "A Texas State Of Mind", "I Just Came Here To Dance", and "Another Honky-Tonk Night On Broadway".

questions.text: What is playing on the TV above the bar?
questions.explanation:
Monday Night Football.

	As a teenager, he toured with brother Lefty and later worked with Buck Owens.

questions.text: Finish the line: "You can slap my bottom everytime you tell a joke, just as long as you keep tipping, I'll laugh until you're _________"?
questions.explanation:
Broke.

	I hope you enjoy this song as much as I do.
